items.sentence: You heard what Tom said last night, didn\'t you?
You know Tom used to live in Boston, don\'t you?
Tom performs in a jazz club three nights a week.
Would you be willing to share your code with me?
I haven\'t broken a Christmas ornament in years.
Tom said he had a stomachache and left the room.
Tom said he was planning to wear a black tuxedo.
Tom said that he was very interested in archery.
Tom shared his bedroom with his younger brother.
Tom speaks French better than he speaks English.
Tom already knows that Mary is going to do that.
I was going to do that the day before yesterday.
Let\'s get together when I get back from Boston.
Let\'s go to the garage and see if Tom is there.
I can\'t thank you enough for all your kindness.
I didn\'t know you still had friends at the IRS.
I know you know how to do what needs to be done.
I don\'t think that Tom will be at school today.
Tom can\'t decide who he should ask to the prom.
Tom can\'t do such a thing and get away with it.
